702103f-a.text:
195 W. Tremont Avenue, at the northwest corner of Loring Place, showing the stable of the large Hugh N. Camp estate. A six-story building, bearing the above street number, was later erected on the site. The Camp Mansion stood to the east of the stable, at the northwest corner of Andrews and Tremont Avenues.
E. P. Chrystie  May 30, 1923
702103f-a.folder: Tremont Avenue (West & Loring Place, Bronx, NY

701410f-a.text:
1820-1830 Loring Place South, adjoining the N.E. corner of West
Tremont Ave., showing the Louis Arms.
1928.
Brown Brothers..
